snippet: An influx of new residents has stoked fears that the Bronx would become the next Brooklyn. But a deeper look suggests that the fears of gentrification are overstated.
abstract: An influx of new residents has stoked fears that the Bronx would become the next Brooklyn. But a deeper look suggests that the fears of gentrification are overstated.

headline.main: How Much Gentrification Is Happening in the Bronx?
